item.name: F19 to Hyper
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::ESCAPE

item.name: Volume up
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F11, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_UP

item.name: volume down
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F10, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_DOWN

item.name: volume mute
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F9, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_VOLUME_MUTE

item.name: Music Control previous
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F6, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_MUSIC_PREV

item.name: Music Control play
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F7, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_MUSIC_PLAY

item.name: Music Control next
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F8, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_MUSIC_NEXT

item.name: Hyper F12 = eject
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::F12, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::VK_CONSUMERKEY_EJECT
